thread.section_title: The Westin San Francisco Airport - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Millbrae, CA) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Union's Annual GMM
thread.title_full: Union's Annual GMM - Review of The Westin San Francisco Airport, Millbrae, CA - TripAdvisor

author: Wanda T
title: Union's Annual GMM
text: The banquet, restaurant and bar, and front desk staff gave our members excellent service. I truly would like to thank Jonathan (R&B) for always making me and other members of our union feel very welcome whenever we stay at this Westin. He remembers our names! The banquet staff is amazing! Thank you Evangelina, Jaswan and everyone else that took care of CAS this past weekend. And the meals, especially Saturday night's banquet was outstanding. Everyone raved over it. As one of the event planners, I can't thank you enough for helping make the affair a success.
